updates.description: Motorola flashing with bootloader unlock, partition write, and auto-detect
SPD PAC parser with partition list, CRC check, and file export
Nokia NBO extractor with tree view and safe file output
SPD diag tools for info read, NV data, IMEI fix, and troubleshoot
UI update with progress bars, better logs, and error control
Fastboot OEM commands, slot control, and flash bypass
Multithread support to stop UI freeze on big files
PAC check with partition size, signature, and compatibility
